scenes.text:
We are Cardiff Uni's trampolining club, we welcome anyone from complete novices who have never been on a trampoline to elite athletes.

We have coaches who attend all sessions and teach all sorts of techniques, we have a multitude of events and competitions both away and in cardiff, as well as competing in BUCS once a year.
We meet regularly for training on Tuesdays and Sundays, but make sure to keep an eye out on our SU page and social medias for specifics and changes to our training schedule.

We have three types of memberships of differing cost:

Standard Membership: £70.00
Social Membership: £5.00
Half-Year Membership: £40.00
We have frequent socials, such as pub and club nights as well as movie nights and other sober socials. Our events are often themed and we hope to see you there!
